meanings.definition: to be suitable or appropriate for
meanings.sent1: The cozy blanket befitted the chilly evening.
meanings.sent2: Her elegant dress befitted the formal occasion.
meanings.sent3: The tiny hat befitted the giant teddy bear, making everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His kind gesture befitted a true gentleman.
meanings.sent5: The golden crown befitted the king's noble head perfectly.

meanings.definition: to be proper or fitting for
meanings.sent1: The bright colors befitted the cheerful atmosphere of the party.
meanings.sent2: His humble attitude befitted his role as a mentor.
meanings.sent3: The oversized shoes befitted the clown, adding to his comedic charm.
meanings.sent4: Her bravery befitted a hero in a storybook.
meanings.sent5: The melodious song befitted the peaceful evening by the lake.

meanings.definition: to be in accordance with or conform to
meanings.sent1: His actions befitted the rules of the game.
meanings.sent2: The simple design befitted the minimalist style of the room.
meanings.sent3: The mismatched socks befitted his quirky personality.
meanings.sent4: Her words befitted the seriousness of the situation.
meanings.sent5: The graceful dance befitted the classical music playing in the background.
